languages.text: Говорили, что, явившись в командную ставку, доблестный капитан изъявил свою готовность повторить штурм, однако Лорд-капитан лишь улыбнул{mf|ся|ась} и пригласил{mf||а} его внутрь. Говорили, что чьи-то нечеловеческие захлебывающиеся вопли, доносившиеся из командной ставки, было слышно даже в арьергарде. Говорили, что капитана и след простыл, а в ставке были обнаружены человеческие потроха, разложенные в странные паттерны, словно бы для нечестивых гаданий. Говорили и много других вещей, которые я не решусь воспроизводить на этих страницах.

There was talk of the valiant captain coming to the command HQ and stating his willingness to repeat the assault, only for the Lord Captain to smile and invite him in. There was talk of someone's strangled screams coming from the command HQ, sounding barely human and so loud they could be heard as far away as the rear guard. There was talk of the captain vanishing without trace and of human viscera found in the command HQ, laid out in strange patterns as though for an unholy divination. There was talk of many other things which I would rather not recount in writing.
languages.original_text: Говорили, что, явившись в командную ставку, доблестный капитан изъявил свою готовность повторить штурм, однако Лорд-капитан лишь улыбнул{mf|ся|ась} и пригласил{mf||а} его внутрь. Говорили, что чьи-то нечеловеческие захлебывающиеся вопли, доносившиеся из командной ставки, было слышно даже в арьергарде. languages.text: 据说，勇敢的上尉来到了指挥中心，表示愿意再次率领士兵发起进攻，但领主舰长却笑着邀请他走了进去。在那之后，有人说指挥中心传来了窒息的尖叫声，尖厉的惨叫声就连外面的卫兵都能听到。有人说上尉消失得无影无踪，指挥中心里只剩下了人类的内脏器官，以古怪的方式摆在地上，仿佛是在进行某种邪恶的占卜。除此之外，还有很多很多别的传言，我就不一一罗列了。
languages.original_text: There was talk of the valiant captain coming to the command HQ and stating his willingness to repeat the assault, only for the Lord Captain to smile and invite him in. There was talk of someone's strangled screams coming from the command HQ, sounding barely human and so loud they could be heard as far away as the rear guard. There was talk of the captain vanishing without trace and of human viscera found in the command HQ, laid out in strange patterns as though for an unholy divination. There was talk of many other things which I would rather not recount in writing.

traits.locale_text: 据说，勇敢的上尉来到了指挥中心，表示愿意再次率领士兵发起进攻，但领主舰长却笑着邀请他走了进去。在那之后，有人说指挥中心传来了窒息的尖叫声，尖厉的惨叫声就连外面的卫兵都能听到。有人说上尉消失得无影无踪，指挥中心里只剩下了人类的内脏器官，以古怪的方式摆在地上，仿佛是在进行某种邪恶的占卜。除此之外，还有很多很多别的传言，我就不一一罗列了。

languages.text: Es hieß, dass der tapfere Captain in die Befehlszentrale kam und seiner Bereitschaft Ausdruck verlieh, den Angriff zu wiederholen, woraufhin der Lord Captain ihn lächelnd hereinbat. Es hieß, dass aus der Befehlszentrale erstickte Schreie zu hören waren, die kaum menschlich klangen und so laut waren, dass selbst die Nachhut sie noch hören konnte. Es hieß, dass der Captain spurlos verschwunden ist und dass in der Befehlszentrale menschliche Eingeweide gefunden wurden, zu seltsamen Mustern angeordnet, wie für ein unheiliges Ritual der Wahrsagerei. Es hieß ... noch vieles andere, was ich lieber nicht schriftlich nacherzählen möchte.
languages.original_text: There was talk of the valiant captain coming to the command HQ and stating his willingness to repeat the assault, only for the Lord Captain to smile and invite him in. There was talk of someone's strangled screams coming from the command HQ, sounding barely human and so loud they could be heard as far away as the rear guard. There was talk of the captain vanishing without trace and of human viscera found in the command HQ, laid out in strange patterns as though for an unholy divination. There was talk of many other things which I would rather not recount in writing.

Es hieß ... noch vieles andere, was ich lieber nicht schriftlich nacherzählen möchte.

languages.text: Se decía que el valeroso capitán había acudido al centro de mando para manifestar su disposición a intentar de nuevo la ofensiva, y que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se había limitado a sonreír y hacerle pasar. Se decía también que se oyeron unos gritos estrangulados procedentes del centro de mando, gritos que no parecían humanos y sonaron tan fuertes que llegaron a oírse incluso en la retaguardia. Se decía que el capitán se había desvanecido sin dejar rastro, y que se hallaron vísceras humanas en el centro de mando, dispuestas en formas extrañas como si se hubiesen utilizado para algún ritual impío de aruspicina. Se decían muchas otras cosas, mas prefiero no dejarlas plasmadas por escrito.
languages.original_text: There was talk of the valiant captain coming to the command HQ and stating his willingness to repeat the assault, only for the Lord Captain to smile and invite him in. There was talk of someone's strangled screams coming from the command HQ, sounding barely human and so loud they could be heard as far away as the rear guard. There was talk of the captain vanishing without trace and of human viscera found in the command HQ, laid out in strange patterns as though for an unholy divination. There was talk of many other things which I would rather not recount in writing.

traits.locale_text: Se decía que el valeroso capitán había acudido al centro de mando para manifestar su disposición a intentar de nuevo la ofensiva, y que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se había limitado a sonreír y hacerle pasar. Se decía también que se oyeron unos gritos estrangulados procedentes del centro de mando, gritos que no parecían humanos y sonaron tan fuertes que llegaron a oírse incluso en la retaguardia. Se decía que el capitán se había desvanecido sin dejar rastro, y que se hallaron vísceras humanas en el centro de mando, dispuestas en formas extrañas como si se hubiesen utilizado para algún ritual impío de aruspicina. Se decían muchas otras cosas, mas prefiero no dejarlas plasmadas por escrito.

languages.text: À son arrivée au poste de commandement, le vaillant capitaine aurait affirmé vouloir lancer un nouvel assaut ; {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} l'aurait alors invité à entrer en souriant. Ensuite, quelqu'un se serait mis à pousser des cris étranglés, à peine humains et si forts que même l'arrière-garde les aurait entendus. Suite à cela, le capitaine aurait disparu sans laisser de traces et des viscères humains auraient été retrouvés dans le poste de commandement, disposés de façon à former des motifs étranges comme à des fins de divination hérétique. On raconte bien d'autres choses que je préfère ne pas rapporter à l'écrit.
languages.original_text: There was talk of the valiant captain coming to the command HQ and stating his willingness to repeat the assault, only for the Lord Captain to smile and invite him in. There was talk of someone's strangled screams coming from the command HQ, sounding barely human and so loud they could be heard as far away as the rear guard. There was talk of the captain vanishing without trace and of human viscera found in the command HQ, laid out in strange patterns as though for an unholy divination. There was talk of many other things which I would rather not recount in writing.

Suite à cela, le capitaine aurait disparu sans laisser de traces et des viscères humains auraient été retrouvés dans le poste de commandement, disposés de façon à former des motifs étranges comme à des fins de divination hérétique. On raconte bien d'autres choses que je préfère ne pas rapporter à l'écrit.

languages.text: 勇敢な中隊長が司令本部にやってきて、襲撃を繰り返す意志を表明したところ、ロード・キャプテンは微笑んで彼を招き入れたという話もある。また別の話では、司令部から誰かの絞め殺されたような悲鳴が聞こえてきたが、人間のものとは思えず、後衛の遠くまで聞こえるほどの大音量だったという。中隊長が忽然と姿を消し、司令本部では人間の内臓が発見され、まるで邪悪な占いのように奇妙な模様に並べられていたという話もあった。その他にも、文章では語りたくないような話がたくさんあった。
languages.original_text: There was talk of the valiant captain coming to the command HQ and stating his willingness to repeat the assault, only for the Lord Captain to smile and invite him in. There was talk of someone's strangled screams coming from the command HQ, sounding barely human and so loud they could be heard as far away as the rear guard. There was talk of many other things which I would rather not recount in writing.

languages.text: Komuta karargâhına gelip taarruzu tekrarlama hususunda gönüllü olduğunu bildiren, gözü pek bir komutana dair bir söylenti vardı. Lord Kaptan, gülümseyerek kendisini içeri davet etmiş diye duydum. Komuta karargâhından boğuk bir çığlık geldiği söyleniyordu. İnsana ait değilmiş izlenimi yaratan bu çığlık, geri hatlardan bile duyulmuştu. Rivayete göre komutan; hiçbir iz bırakmadan ortadan kaybolmuş, iç organları ise habis bir kehanetin tuhaf desenlerini andırır şekilde komuta karargâhına dağılmıştı. Yazıya dökmek istemediğim daha bir çok söylenti mevcuttu.
languages.original_text: There was talk of the valiant captain coming to the command HQ and stating his willingness to repeat the assault, only for the Lord Captain to smile and invite him in. There was talk of someone's strangled screams coming from the command HQ, sounding barely human and so loud they could be heard as far away as the rear guard. There was talk of the captain vanishing without trace and of human viscera found in the command HQ, laid out in strange patterns as though for an unholy divination. There was talk of many other things which I would rather not recount in writing.
